epub-m4b-tts: Convert EPUB e-books into m4b audiobooks, using TTS to read the text aloud.
m4b: The save path for the converted M4B file (if left blank, a specific path will be designated)
key: Limit the maximum number of chapters before reading aloud
m4b1: File path where M4B is saved
convert-epub-e-books-into-high-quality-a: Convert EPUB e-books into high-quality audiobooks using Azure Text-to-Speech technology.
